Herosection.heading: CT Assessment
Herosection.description: Study of cooling tower thermal design, fan curves, operating duty point, performance curves, nozzle and duct sizing and present performance to predicted performance. In house and international computer programmes to check ratings of cooling tower.

Herosection.heading: CT Site Data Verification
Herosection.description: Site visits, physical observation of critical parameters, critical components like CT fan, Nozzles, CT Fills, CT layout and other possible causes of loss of performance. Site operating conditions vs cooling tower design considerations. Data collections at site using latest equipment.

Herosection.heading: CT Performance Testing
Herosection.description: We carry out PG test for cooling towers as per CTI ATC 105 to verify the performance of New or Existing cooling towers to verify the capability of the towers. This includes data to be collected as per performance test method CTI ATC 105 and additional data like air velocity and temperatures contours above drift eliminators, fan air flow measurement, inlet air velocity contours, recirculation patterns.

Herosection.heading: CT Performance Upgrade Solutions
Herosection.description: We provide total solutions to cooling tower performance shortfall. From collecting and analysing Data to provide solutions in the form of change of components, improving existing components and providing experienced agency to carry out the work successfully.

Herosection.heading: CT Seminars And Training Cooling Tower Seminars And Training
Herosection.description: We carry out PG test for cooling towers as per CTI ATC 105 to verify the performance of New or Existing cooling towers to verify the capability of the towers. This includes data to be collected as per performance test method CTI ATC 105 and additional data like air velocity and temperatures contours above drift eliminators, fan air flow measurement, inlet air velocity contours, recirculation patterns.

Herosection.heading: CT Bid Specifications And Bid Reviews
Herosection.description: We carry out PG test for cooling towers as per CTI ATC 105 to verify the performance of New or Existing cooling towers to verify the capability of the towers. This includes data to be collected as per performance test method CTI ATC 105 and additional data like air velocity and temperatures contours above drift eliminators, fan air flow measurement, inlet air velocity contours, recirculation patterns.

Herosection.heading: Water Flow Testing
Herosection.description: We can provide services for measurement of water flow using either ultrasonic flow meter or traversing pitot tube.
